title: Load .gpx files from disk — load_gpx
text: function loads locally stored .gpx file returns simple features (sf) dataframe.

title: Load .gpx files from disk — load_gpx

what: Unzip a Strava archive and return a dataframe of activities — process_strava_archive
title: Unzip a Strava archive and return a dataframe of activities — process_strava_archive
text: function unzips strava archive stored zip file. zip file loaded path zip_file_path.  unzipped file stored outdir. outdir already exist, created. Multiple folders can created recursively. function returns dataframe summarizing activities stored archive. See Strava's guide downloading archive: https://support.strava.com/hc/en-us/articles/216918437-Exporting--Data--Bulk-Export#h_01GG58HC4F1BGQ9PQZZVANN6WF Note: Use function bulk downloads individual activities!

title: Unzip a Strava archive and return a dataframe of activities — process_strava_archive
Unzip a Strava archive and return a dataframe of activities — process_strava_archive
text: zip_file_path single character vector. path archive stored computer outdir single character vector. file path folder want store unzipped files. Defaults current working directory.

title: Unzip a Strava archive and return a dataframe of activities — process_strava_archive
Unzip a Strava archive and return a dataframe of activities — process_strava_archive
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # Return a dataframe of activies activities_df <- process_strava_archive(zip_file_path = "export_1111111.zip",                                          outdir = "./data")  # unzip the archive without creating a dataframe of activies # return files to the current working directory  process_strava_archive(         zip_file_path = "export_1111111.zip")         } # }
